SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations

Interface MyShelfieComponent

All Known Implementing Classes:
BookshelfView, ChatViewBox, CommonGoalView, EndGameTokenView, FirstPlayerSeatView, HPointPane, MyShelfieButton, MyShelfieChoiceBox, MyShelfieGraphicIcon, MyShelfieLabel, MyShelfieTriangleButton, OpponentBookshelfView, PersonalBookshelfView, PersonalGoalView, PointCell, PointPane, PointPlayerBox, ScoringTokenView, SingleMessageView, SingleMessageViewContainer, SquarePointPane, TileSubjectView
public interface MyShelfieComponent

Represents a customizable node

It is directly related to the MyShelfieDecoration

The purpose of this interface is to define some basic operations that every customized component needs to implement

Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emamuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi
See Also:

    • getMyShelfieResource

      @Nullable default URL getMyShelfieResource(String filePath, String errormessage)
      Used to load image file from the project structure
      Parameters:
      filePath - Complete path from the root of the resource folder to the file itself
      errormessage - an error message to display at video if the resource specified is not found in the project structure
      Returns:
      The complete path to the desired file if it is found, null otherwise.

    • getMyShelfieResource

      @Nullable default URL getMyShelfieResource(String mainPath, String supportPath, String errormessage)
      Used to load image file from the project structure If the main file path specified doesn't correspond to a file in the project, the second path is considered
      Parameters:
      mainPath - Complete path from the root of the resource folder to the file itself
      supportPath - A second path that corresponds to another file in the project.
      errormessage - an error message to display at video if the resource specified is not found in the project structure
      Returns:
      The complete path to the desired file if it is found, the path to the support file if the first one is not found; in the end null if neither the first nor the second file is found

    • getOptionalMyShelfieResource

      static Optional<URL> getOptionalMyShelfieResource(String filePath, String... errormessage)
      Load image file from the project structure if it is found, returns an empty optional if the file doesn't exist
      Parameters:
      filePath - complete path from the root of the resource folder to the file itself
      errormessage - the optional error message to display at video if the resource specified is not found in the project structure
      Returns:
      the complete path to the desired file if it is found, null otherwise.
